title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.4 - Markings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.4 - Markings

State Regulations

The marking of each lot of food stored in a refrigerated
warehouse with the required identification lot number shall be by means of a
stamp or other suitable marking on the container in which the food is packed, or on a tag securely attached to the container or to the food
itself. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
246.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
